thread.title: Katrina Kaif joins the league of Princess Diana, Scarlett Johanson, Angelina Jolie, Kate Moss – here’s how
thread.title_full: Katrina Kaif joins the league of Princess Diana, Scarlett Johanson, Angelina Jolie, Kate Moss – here’s how

author: Aarti Iyengar
title: Katrina Kaif joins the league of Princess Diana, Scarlett Johanson, Angelina Jolie, Kate Moss – here’s how
text:
Bollywood hotties Katrina Kaif and Parineeti Chopra go on a movie date 
Today morning we got our hands on photos of Katrina Kaif rubbing her shoulders with international photographer Mario Testino. For those who follow fashion and style, you might know that Marios is royalty when it comes to photography and the arts. He is one of the most sought after lensmen in the world! So when we spotted Katrina posing and clicking pictures with him our curiosity knew no bounds! Testino is one of world’s ace fashion photographers who is affiliated with GQ, Vogue, Vanity Fair and more. He has not only done some phenomenal shoots for the magazines internationally but has also shot some of the top notch personalities. From Princess Diana to Scarlett Johansson to Kate Moss to Blake Lively, he has conducted photoshoots with a lot of them and the result has been quite spectacular. 
So what secret recipe are Katrina and Mario cooking ? A source reveals that Mario has shot a stunning photoshoot with Kat and the pictures have turned out amazing! The photos are going to be as breathtaking as one can imagine. Although the photoshoot has been kept under the wraps, the crew working on it has been gushing about the project to everyone. This would also be the first time Mario has clicked a Bollywood actress. Could it be more exciting? The Vogue party in honour of Testino was held in Delhi on January 31, where many from the publication along with Katrina were present. There were quite a few pics of the Tiger Zinda Hai actress striking a pose with the ace photographer. In fact, makeup genius Val Garland was also present at the event which only means one thing, it’s going to be a bigger project than one anticipated. In case you missed out, we’ve attached pics from #lastnight. ( ALSO READ – Katrina Kaif attends Vogue x Mario Testino night wearing Alexis Mabille – yay or nay? ) 
Katrina Kaif with Mario Testino – Jan 31, 2017 at 9:39am PST 
Katrina Kaif with Val Garland – 
A photo posted by VOGUE India (@vogueindia) on Jan 31, 2017 at 10:15am PST 
We’re going to have a tough time staying calm because every time Vogue and Katrina Kaif team, the shoot always turns out to be better than the previous one! In fact, the hotness quotient always turns a notch up. Add the fact that this time Vogue will have not just Kat but also Mario and we’re already losing our shit. Let’s hope all the wait is worth it. If you need to know and see more of Testino’s work, then you better check out his site. You’ll be surprised to see what a fabulous work he does with his muse. See it HERE . 
Stay tuned to this space and we’ll make sure to get the Vogue shoot for you! Don’t go anywhere. That makes us ask, have you checked out Vogue’s Alia Bhatt cover? What are you waiting for then? See it here and tell us your thoughts in the comments section below.
